content: work in leg pattern across 25 sts sl marker k1 ssk k around to 3 sts before the end of round k2tog k1 round 2 work without decreases sts repeat these two rnds until you have 48 sts on your needles *note if you have an odd number of sts in the last decreases round simply do an extra decrease only from one side of the gusset it doesn t matter which side you do this extra decrease foot continue work in the leg pattern only the first 25 sts and stockinette on the last 23 sts until your foot reaches your desired length before beginning your toe decreases i begin shaping for the toes once my sock reaches just to the tip of my pinky toe if you knit gift socks and can t try them on you can use the following tips for sock length measuring from the back of the heel to the end of the -12 29-30 5 cm i start toe decreases at approximately 1 7 -2 4-5 cm before the end desired foot length shown above toe decreases round 1 k2tog k21 k2tog k2tog k19 k2tog 44 sts on the needles rnds 2-4 knit to the end round 5 k2tog k19 k2tog k2tog k17 k2tog 40 sts on the needles rnds 6-7 knit to the end round 8 k2tog k17 k2tog k2tog k15 k2tog 36 sts on the needles round 9 knit to the end round 10 k2tog k15 k2tog k2tog k13 k2tog 32 sts on the needles round 11 k2tog k13 k2tog k2tog k11 k2tog 28 sts on the needles round 12 k2tog k11 k2tog k2tog k9 k2tog 24 sts on the needles round 13 k2tog k9 k2tog k2tog k7 k2tog 20 sts on the needles round 14 k2tog k7 k2tog k2tog k5 k2tog 16 sts on the needles round 15 k2tog k5 k2tog 14 sts on the needles 7 sts on first circular needle and 7 sts on second circular needle needles 14 sts graft the toe sts together these 2 sets of 7 sts using kitchener sts weave in ends knit the second sock in the same way finishing block carefully following any yarn care instructions on the ball band knit the second sock in the same way © 2024 cozysocksstore
